title: 打开/创建世界就崩溃
author: 下路ADC
txt_content:
RT，每次都是加载世界后崩掉，右上角已经出现"按E打开物品栏"了.

Java版本:1.8_102
系统:Windows 7 x64 
Minecraft:1.7.10
Forge:10.13.4.1614

crash-report:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// On the bright side, I bought you a teddy bear!

Time: 16-7-31 上午8:55
Description: Ticking memory connection

java.lang.NullPointerException: Ticking memory connection
